titleStmt.title: The providence of God in sudden death ordinary and extraordinary vindicated and improved in a funeral sermon for Mrs. Mary Reve, wife to Mr. Nicholas Reve, merchant : first preached to the English Church in Rotterdam, January 14, 1685, and since enlarged / by Joseph Hill.
titleStmt.author: Hill, Joseph, 1625-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
